text: Cyclone (real name Maxine Hunkel) is a fictional character in the DC Comics universe. The character was created by Mark Waid, Alex Ross, Geoff Johns and Dale Eaglesham. == Fictional character biography == She is the granddaughter of the original Red Tornado and a member of the Justice Society of America. == In other media == Cyclone made her first movie appearance in 2022's Black Adam set in the DC Extended Universe. ==References== Category:DC Comics superheroes
title: Cyclone (DC Comics)
